pages.text: Barcross is a military submarine that provides its fleet with intel on enemy positions. It is equipped with a highly advanced sonar system that takes up so much room that the ship has no offensive weaponry. Because of this, Barcross never travels alone...
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/torpedo_decoy)$(l)Torpedo Decoy/$$(br)Barcross $(l)deploys a torpedo decoy at the selected tile/$. Any $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/torpedo)Torpedoes/$ that hit it, are $(l)nullified/$. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)8 Energy/$ to use. ($(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/deployables/barcross_active)Torpedo Decoy)
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/major_insight)$(l)Intel Share/$$(br)$(l)As Barcross sinks/$, it uploads all its data to the fleet, $(l)revealing the location of an opponent ship/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
